kernel - based classifiers.from sentence: All the above subtasks have been modeled as binary classification problems : kernel - based classifiers are trained and the classification score is used to sort the instances and produce the final ranking .

classifiers and kernels.from sentence: All classifiers and kernels have been implemented within the Kernel - based Learning Platform 2 ( KeLP ) , thus determining the team 's name .

tree kernels.from sentence: The proposed solution provides three main contributions : ( i ) we employ the approach proposed in , which applies tree kernels directly to question and answer texts modeled as pairs of linked syntactic trees .

classifiers.from sentence: ( iii ) we propose a stacking schema so that classifiers for Subtask B and C exploit the inferences obtained in the previous subtasks .
